mapper.select: SELECT q.id AS id, p.id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, pt.id AS productTemplateId, p.image, p.sell_price AS price, p.storefront_id AS storefrontId, s.storefront_name AS storefrontName, s.system_logo AS storefrontIcon, pt.unit_id AS unitId, pt.value_name_arr as valueNameArr, pt.value_id_arr as valueIdArr, pt.unit_name AS unitName FROM dj_design_quantity_room_product q INNER JOIN dj_basics_product_template pt ON q.product_id = pt.id INNER JOIN dj_basics_storefront_product p ON pt.id = p.prod_template_id INNER JOIN dj_basics_storefront s ON p.storefront_id = s.id WHERE q.house_id = #{houseId} AND q.type = #{type} AND q.data_status = 0 ORDER BY q.create_date desc
